entry.content: È¢òÈù¢DescriptionÊüêÂ§©Ôºå$Lostmonkey$ÂèëÊòé‰∫Ü‰∏ÄÁßçË∂ÖÁ∫ßÂºπÂäõË£ÖÁΩÆÔºå‰∏∫‰∫ÜÂú®‰ªñÁöÑÁªµÁæäÊúãÂèãÈù¢ÂâçÊòæÊëÜÔºå‰ªñÈÇÄËØ∑Â∞èÁªµÁæä‰∏ÄËµ∑Áé©‰∏™Ê∏∏Êàè„ÄÇÊ∏∏Êàè‰∏ÄÂºÄÂßãÔºå$Lostmonkey$Âú®Âú∞‰∏äÊ≤øÁùÄ‰∏ÄÊù°Áõ¥Á∫øÊëÜ‰∏ä$n$‰∏™Ë£ÖÁΩÆÔºåÊØè‰∏™Ë£ÖÁΩÆËÆæÂÆöÂàùÂßãÂºπÂäõÁ≥ªÊï∞$k_i$ÔºåÂΩìÁªµÁæäËææÂà∞Á¨¨$i$‰∏™Ë£ÖÁΩÆÊó∂ÔºåÂÆÉ‰ºöÂæÄÂêéÂºπ$k_i$Ê≠•ÔºåËææÂà∞Á¨¨$i+k_i$‰∏™Ë£ÖÁΩÆÔºåËã•‰∏çÂ≠òÂú®Á¨¨$i+k_i$‰∏™Ë£ÖÁΩÆÔºåÂàôÁªµÁæäË¢´ÂºπÈ£û„ÄÇÁªµÁæäÊÉ≥Áü•ÈÅìÂΩìÂÆÉ‰ªéÁ¨¨$i$‰∏™Ë£ÖÁΩÆËµ∑Ê≠•Êó∂ÔºåË¢´ÂºπÂá†Ê¨°Âêé‰ºöË¢´ÂºπÈ£û„ÄÇ‰∏∫‰∫Ü‰ΩøÂæóÊ∏∏ÊàèÊõ¥ÊúâË∂£Ôºå$Lostmonkey$ÂèØ‰ª•‰øÆÊîπÊüê‰∏™ÂºπÂäõË£ÖÁΩÆÁöÑÂºπÂäõÁ≥ªÊï∞Ôºå‰ªª‰ΩïÊó∂ÂÄôÂºπÂäõÁ≥ªÊï∞Âùá‰∏∫Ê≠£Êï¥Êï∞„ÄÇ InputÁ¨¨‰∏ÄË°åÂåÖÂê´‰∏Ä‰∏™Êï¥Êï∞$n$ÔºåË°®Á§∫Âú∞‰∏äÊúâ$n$‰∏™Ë£ÖÁΩÆÔºåË£ÖÁΩÆÁöÑÁºñÂè∑‰ªé$0$Âà∞$n-1$,Êé•‰∏ãÊù•‰∏ÄË°åÊúâ$n$‰∏™Ê≠£Êï¥Êï∞Ôºå‰æùÊ¨°‰∏∫ÈÇ£$n$‰∏™Ë£ÖÁΩÆÁöÑÂàùÂßãÂºπÂäõÁ≥ªÊï∞„ÄÇÁ¨¨‰∏âË°åÊúâ‰∏Ä‰∏™Ê≠£Êï¥Êï∞$m$ÔºåÊé•‰∏ãÊù•$m$Ë°åÊØèË°åËá≥Â∞ëÊúâ‰∏§‰∏™Êï∞$i$„ÄÅ$j$ÔºåËã•$i=1$Ôºå‰Ω†Ë¶ÅËæìÂá∫‰ªé$j$Âá∫ÂèëË¢´ÂºπÂá†Ê¨°ÂêéË¢´ÂºπÈ£ûÔºåËã•$i=2$ÂàôËøò‰ºöÂÜçËæìÂÖ•‰∏Ä‰∏™Ê≠£Êï¥Êï∞$k$ÔºåË°®Á§∫Á¨¨$j$‰∏™ÂºπÂäõË£ÖÁΩÆÁöÑÁ≥ªÊï∞Ë¢´‰øÆÊîπÊàê$k$„ÄÇÂØπ‰∫é$20\%$ÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆ$n,m \leq 10000$ÔºåÂØπ‰∫é$100\%$ÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆ$n \leq 200000,m \leq 100000$ OutputÂØπ‰∫éÊØè‰∏™$i=1$ÁöÑÊÉÖÂÜµÔºå‰Ω†ÈÉΩË¶ÅËæìÂá∫‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈúÄË¶ÅÁöÑÊ≠•Êï∞ÔºåÂç†‰∏ÄË°å„ÄÇ Sample Input12345641 2 1 131 12 1 11 1 Sample Output1223 ÂàÜÊûêÊçÆËØ¥ÊòØ$LCT$Ë£∏È¢òÔºåÁÑ∂ËÄåÊú¨ËíüËíªÂπ∂‰∏ç‰ºöÔºåËÄÉËôëÊï∞ÊçÆËåÉÂõ¥Ôºå$n \leq 200000$ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•Áî®$O(n \sqrt n)$ÁöÑÂàÜÂùóÂ§ßÊ≥ï„ÄÇ ÂàÜÂùóÂêéÊÄé‰πàÂÅöÂë¢Ôºü Êàë‰ª¨ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁÇπË∑≥Âá∫ÂÆÉÊâÄÂú®ÁöÑÂùóÊâÄÈúÄÁöÑÂºπË∑≥Ê¨°Êï∞ÂíåÂÆÉË∑≥Âá∫ÂΩìÂâçÂùó‰ª•ÂêéËêΩÂú®Âì™‰∏ÄÂùó„ÄÇ‰∫éÊòØÊàë‰ª¨ÂèëÁé∞ÂΩìÊàë‰ª¨‰øÆÊîπ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁÇπ$p$‰ª•ÂêéÔºåÊàë‰ª¨Âè™ÈúÄË¶Å‰øÆÊîπËøô‰∏™ÂùóÂÜÖÂú®ÁÇπ$p$‰πãÂâçÁöÑÁÇπÔºàÂáÜÁ°ÆÁöÑËØ¥ÔºåÊòØÂùóÂÜÖ‰∏≠ÈÄî‰ºöË∑≥Âà∞$p$ÁöÑÁÇπÔºâÔºåÂõ†‰∏∫ÊØè‰∏™ÁÇπËÆ∞ÂΩïÁöÑ‰∏úË•øÂè™ÁÆ°ÂÆÉË∑≥Âá∫ÂÆÉÊâÄÂú®ÁöÑÂùóÁöÑ‰∏ÄÁ≥ªÂàóÁä∂ÊÄÅÔºåËá≥‰∫éÂÆÉÂêéÈù¢ÁöÑÂëΩËøêÊòØ‰∏çÁÆ°ÁöÑ„ÄÇ ÂàùÂßãÂåñÁöÑ‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ã„ÄÇ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627inline void init() //ÊâÄÊúâÂàùÂßãÂåñÂ∑•‰Ωú jumptime[i]Ë°®Á§∫iÁÇπË∑≥Âá∫ÂùóÊâÄÈúÄÁöÑÊ¨°Êï∞Ôºåoutplace[i]Ë°®Á§∫iÁÇπË∑≥Âá∫Âùó‰ª•ÂêéÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆ{ size=sqrt(n); //ÁÆóÂùóÂ§ßÂ∞è for (register int i=1;i<=size;++i) { L[i]=(i-1)*size+1; R[i]=i*size; } //ÊØè‰∏ÄÂùóÁöÑÂ∑¶Âè≥Áïå if (R[size]<n) { ++size; L[size]=R[size-1]+1; R[size]=n; } //ÂèØËÉΩÂ≠òÂú®ÁöÑÊúÄÂêé‰∏ÄÂùó for (register int i=1;i<=size;++i) for (register int j=L[i];j<=R[i];++j) belong[j]=i; //ÊØè‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁÇπÂú®Âì™‰∏ÄÂùó for (register int i=size;i>=1;i--) for (register int j=R[i];j>=L[i];j--) { if (j+a[j]>R[i]) jumptime[j]=1,outplace[j]=j+a[j]; //Â¶ÇÊûúË∑≥‰∏ÄÊ¨°Â∞±ËÉΩË∑≥Âá∫ÂéªÔºåÈÇ£‰πàË∑≥Âá∫ÂéªÁöÑÊ¨°Êï∞‰∏∫1ÔºåË∑≥Âá∫ÂéªÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆÂ∞±ÊòØj+a[j] else jumptime[j]=jumptime[j+a[j]]+1,outplace[j]=outplace[j+a[j]]; //Âê¶ÂàôË∑≥Âá∫ÂéªÁöÑÊ¨°Êï∞Â∞±ÊòØjumptime[j+a[j]]+1,Ë∑≥Âá∫ÂéªÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆÂ∞±ÊòØoutplace[j+a[j]] } //Áî±Ê≠§ÂèØÁü•Âæ™ÁéØË¶ÅÂÄíÂ∫èÔºåÂõ†‰∏∫Ë∑≥‰∏çÂá∫ÂéªÁöÑÁÇπÁöÑÁä∂ÊÄÅÊòØÁî±ÂÆÉË∑≥‰∏ÄÊ¨°Ë∑≥Âà∞ÁöÑÈÇ£‰∏™ÁÇπÂÜ≥ÂÆöÁöÑ return;} ‰øÆÊîπÁöÑ‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ã 12345678910inline void change(int p,int k){ a[p]=k; //‰øÆÊîπ for (register int i=p;i>=L[belong[p]];--i) //ÂØπpÁÇπÂèäÂùóÂÜÖÂâçÈù¢ÊâÄÊúâÁÇπÊõ¥ÊîπÁä∂ÊÄÅÔºàËôΩËØ¥Âè™Ë¶ÅÊõ¥ÊîπËÉΩË∑≥Âà∞pÁöÑÔºå‰ΩÜÊòØÂ§çÊùÇÂ∫¶Ê≤°‰ªÄ‰πàÂå∫Âà´Ôºâ if (i+a[i]>R[belong[i]]) jumptime[i]=1,outplace[i]=i+a[i]; //Ëøô‰∫õÂíå‰∏äÈù¢ÈÉΩ‰∏ÄÊ†∑ÔºåÁõ∏ÂΩì‰∫éÊîπ‰∫Ü‰ª•ÂêéÈáçÊñ∞ÁÆó‰∏ÄÊ¨°ÔºåÂÜçÁªôÂÆÉ‰∏ÄÊ¨°Êú∫‰ºöÁúãÁúãËÉΩ‰∏çËÉΩË∑≥Âá∫Âéª else jumptime[i]=jumptime[i+a[i]]+1,outplace[i]=outplace[i+a[i]]; return;} Êúâ‰∫ÜËøô‰∏™ÊÉ≥Ê≥ï‰ª•ÂêéËØ¢ÈóÆÂ∞±ÂçÅÂàÜÊòæÁÑ∂‰∫Ü ‰ªé$p$ÁÇπÂºÄÂßãË∑≥ÔºåÁî®$ans$ÂèòÈáèËÆ∞ÂΩïÊ¨°Êï∞Ôºå‰Ωø$p$‰∏çÊñ≠Ë∑≥Ë∑ÉË∑≥Âá∫ÂÆÉÊâÄÂú®ÁöÑÂùóÔºåÂêåÊó∂$ans$Âä†‰∏äË∑≥Âá∫ÂéªÈúÄË¶ÅÁöÑÊ≠•Êï∞ÔºåÁõ¥Âà∞Ë∑≥Âá∫Âéª„ÄÇ ‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ã 12345678910inline int query(int p){ register int ans=0; while (p<=n) { ans+=jumptime[p]; //Âä†‰∏äË∑≥Âá∫ÂùóÊâÄÈúÄÁöÑÊ≠•Êï∞ p=outplace[p]; //Ë∑≥Âà∞‰∏ã‰∏Ä‰∏™‰ΩçÁΩÆ } return ans;} Code1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374757677787980818283848586878889909192939495#include<iostream>#include<cstdio>#include<cstring>#include<cmath>#include<algorithm>#define MAXN 200005#define MAXS 450using namespace std;int n,a[MAXN],size,L[MAXS],R[MAXS],belong[MAXN];int m,opt,pos,num,jumptime[MAXN],outplace[MAXN];inline void getnum(int &num){ num=0; char c=getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c=getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) { num=(num<<3)+(num<<1)+(c&15); c=getchar(); } return;}inline void init(){ size=sqrt(n); for (register int i=1;i<=size;++i) { L[i]=(i-1)*size+1; R[i]=i*size; } if (R[size]<n) { ++size; L[size]=R[size-1]+1; R[size]=n; } for (register int i=1;i<=size;++i) for (register int j=L[i];j<=R[i];++j) belong[j]=i; for (register int i=size;i>=1;i--) for (register int j=R[i];j>=L[i];j--) { if (j+a[j]>R[i]) jumptime[j]=1,outplace[j]=j+a[j]; else jumptime[j]=jumptime[j+a[j]]+1,outplace[j]=outplace[j+a[j]]; } return;}inline void change(int p,int k){ a[p]=k; for (register int i=p;i>=L[belong[p]];--i) if (i+a[i]>R[belong[i]]) jumptime[i]=1,outplace[i]=i+a[i]; else jumptime[i]=jumptime[i+a[i]]+1,outplace[i]=outplace[i+a[i]]; return;}inline int query(int p){ register int ans=0; while (p<=n) { ans+=jumptime[p]; p=outplace[p]; } return ans;}int main(){ getnum(n); for (register int i=1;i<=n;++i) getnum(a[i]); init(); getnum(m); while (m--) { getnum(opt),getnum(pos); if (opt==1) printf("%d\n",query(pos+1)); else { getnum(num); change(pos+1,num); } } return 0;} ÈÄüÂ∫¶ËøòË°å„ÄÇ

entry.content: ÊÑèÊÉ≥‰∏çÂà∞ÁöÑÁªìÂ±Ä„ÄÇ Áî∑‰∫∫ËØ¥ÁöÑ‰∏ÄÁï™ËØùËøòÊòØÊå∫ÊúâÂë≥ÈÅìÁöÑ„ÄÇ Â•ΩÂ•ΩÁúãËßÜÈ¢ëÂêß„ÄÇ (function(){var player = new DPlayer({"container":document.getElementById("dplayer0"),"theme":"#FADFA3","loop":true,"video":{"url":"https://doc-08-7g-docs.googleusercontent.com/docs/securesc/8kla0sou591fvae6p9fkntbk87hfqb4f/4schm0in7nmhmddc3pnskkaqbgq16jpc/1563177600000/00631883490246717053/00631883490246717053/1SQEQJrXyu3J-9cHutLXFjO7C6ve1CzCr?e=download&gd=true&access_token=ya29.GlxGB807hkHXm2mWYLuTJuMHMbQiTPOSLz_ThKdOboFlV81Jcq4dl3LzpmpQsL9-TB7_dg-hYNbAneWemV1eOUdf8b9UjpdVZENqZHEmF6oUHHn7_kO5DJIgXMEgGw"}});window.dplayers||(window.dplayers=[]);window.dplayers.push(player);})()

entry.title: „ÄêÊ®°Êùø„ÄëÁ∫øÊÆµÊ†ë
entry.content: Ëß£ÈáäËµ∑Êù•ÊúâÁÇπÂ§çÊùÇÔºåÁõ¥Êé•‰∏ä‰ª£Á†ÅÂêß(lllÔø¢œâÔø¢) #include<iostream>#include<cstdio>#include<cstring>#include<cmath>#include<algorithm>#define lch (root<<1)#define rch ((root<<1)|1)#define mod(x) ((((x)%p)+p)%p)#define MAXN 100005typedef long long LL;using namespace std;LL n,m,p,q,w,e;LL a[MAXN];int ord;struct Segment_tree{ LL val,add_tag,mul_tag; Segment_tree() {add_tag=0,mul_tag=1;}}seg[MAXN*4];template<typename T>inline void getnum(T &num){ num=0; char c=getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c=getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) { num=(num<<3)+(num<<1)+(c&15); c=getchar(); } return;}inline void build_seg(LL root,LL l,LL r){ seg[root].add_tag=0; seg[root].mul_tag=1; if (l==r) seg[root].val=mod(a[l]); else { register LL mid=(l+r)>>1; build_seg(lch,l,mid); build_seg(rch,mid+1,r); seg[root].val=mod(seg[lch].val+seg[rch].val); } return;}inline void seg_add(LL root,LL l,LL r,LL v){ seg[root].val=mod(seg[root].val+(r-l+1)*v); seg[root].add_tag=mod(seg[root].add_tag+v); return;}inline void seg_mul(LL root,LL v){ seg[root].val=mod(seg[root].val*v); seg[root].add_tag=mod(seg[root].add_tag*v); seg[root].mul_tag=mod(seg[root].mul_tag*v); return;}inline void pushdown(LL root,LL l,LL r){ register LL mid=(l+r)>>1; if (seg[root].mul_tag!=1) { seg_mul(lch,seg[root].mul_tag); seg_mul(rch,seg[root].mul_tag); seg[root].mul_tag=1; } if (seg[root].add_tag!=0) { seg_add(lch,l,mid,seg[root].add_tag); seg_add(rch,mid+1,r,seg[root].add_tag); seg[root].add_tag=0; } return;}inline void Add(LL root,LL l,LL r,LL x,LL y,LL v){ if (l==x&&y==r) { seg_add(root,l,r,v); return; } LL mid=(l+r)>>1; pushdown(root,l,r); if (y<=mid) Add(lch,l,mid,x,y,v); else if (x>mid) Add(rch,mid+1,r,x,y,v); else { Add(lch,l,mid,x,mid,v); Add(rch,mid+1,r,mid+1,y,v); } seg[root].val=mod(seg[lch].val+seg[rch].val); return;}inline void Mul(LL root,LL l,LL r,LL x,LL y,LL v){ if (l==x&&r==y) { seg_mul(root,v); return; } LL mid=(l+r)>>1; pushdown(root,l,r); if (y<=mid) Mul(lch,l,mid,x,y,v); else if (x>mid) Mul(rch,mid+1,r,x,y,v); else { Mul(lch,l,mid,x,mid,v); Mul(rch,mid+1,r,mid+1,y,v); } seg[root].val=mod(seg[lch].val+seg[rch].val); return; }inline LL query(LL root,LL l,LL r,LL x,LL y){ if (l==x&&r==y) return mod(seg[root].val); pushdown(root,l,r); register LL mid=(l+r)>>1; if (y<=mid) return mod(query(lch,l,mid,x,y)); else if (x>mid) return mod(query(rch,mid+1,r,x,y)); else return mod(mod(query(lch,l,mid,x,mid))+mod(query(rch,mid+1,r,mid+1,y)));}int main(){ getnum(n),getnum(m),getnum(p); for (register int i=1;i<=n;++i) getnum(a[i]); build_seg(1,1,n); while (m--) { getnum(ord); switch (ord) { case 1: getnum(q),getnum(w),getnum(e); Mul(1,1,n,q,w,e); break; case 2: getnum(q),getnum(w),getnum(e); Add(1,1,n,q,w,e); break; default: getnum(q),getnum(w); printf("%lld\n",query(1,1,n,q,w)); } } return 0;}

entry.title: „ÄêÊ®°Êùø„ÄëÂÄçÂ¢ûLCA
entry.content: ËøòÊòØÂæàÂ•ΩÁêÜËß£ÁöÑÂÅöÊ≥ï Âª∫Â•ΩËæπ‰πãÂêéÔºå‰ªéÊ†πËäÇÁÇπÂºÄÂßã$dfs$ÔºåÂ§ÑÁêÜÂ•ΩÊØè‰∏™ÁÇπÁöÑÊ∑±Â∫¶ÂíåÂÆÉÂæÄ‰∏äË∑≥$2^k$Â±ÇÁöÑÁ•ñÂÖà„ÄÇ 1234567891011inline void dfs(int u,int fa){ depth[u]=depth[fa]+1; f[u][0]=fa; for (register int i=1;(1<<i)<=depth[u];++i) f[u][i]=f[f[u][i-1]][i-1]; for (register int i=head[u];i;i=nxt[i]) if (endd[i]!=fa) dfs(endd[i],u); return;} Ëøô‰∫õÈÉΩÂ§ÑÁêÜÂÆå‰∫ÜÔºåÂÜçÂ∞±ÊòØ$lca$‰∫Ü„ÄÇÂÅáËÆæË¶ÅÊ±ÇÁöÑÊòØ$x$Âíå$y$‰∏§‰∏™ÁÇπÁöÑ$lca$„ÄÇÂÖàÊâæÂá∫$x$Âíå$y$‰πãÈó¥Ê∑±Â∫¶ËæÉÂ§ßÁöÑÈÇ£‰∏™ÁÇπÔºåÊääÂÆÉÂæÄ‰∏äË∑≥ÔºåË∑≥Âà∞ÂíåÂè¶‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁÇπÊ∑±Â∫¶Áõ∏Âêå„ÄÇÁÑ∂Âêé‰∏§‰∏™ÁÇπ‰∏ÄËµ∑ÂæÄ‰∏äË∑≥„ÄÇËøô‰∏™ËøáÁ®ã‰ΩøÁî®Âæ™ÁéØÂÆûÁé∞„ÄÇÂæ™ÁéØÂèòÈáè$i$‰ªé$Log[depth[x]]$ÂºÄÂßã‰∏ÄÁõ¥Âæ™ÁéØÂà∞$0$„ÄÇÊØèÊ¨°Âà§Êñ≠$f[x][i]$Âíå$f[y][i]$ÁöÑÂÖ≥Á≥ªÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûú‰∏çÁõ∏Á≠âÈÇ£‰πàÂ∞±Êää$x$Âíå$y$Ë∑≥Âà∞$f[x][i]$Âíå$f[y][i]$ÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆ„ÄÇÊúÄÂêé‰∏§ËÄÖËÇØÂÆöË∑≥Âà∞$lca$ÁöÑ‰∏ãÈù¢ÈÇ£‰∏™ÁÇπÔºå‰∫éÊòØËøîÂõû$f[x][0]$„ÄÇ 12345678910111213inline int lca(int x,int y){ if (depth[x]<depth[y]) swap(x,y); while (depth[x]>depth[y]) x=f[x][Log[depth[x]-depth[y]]]; if (x==y) return x; for (register int i=Log[depth[x]];~i;--i) if (f[x][i]!=f[y][i]) x=f[x][i],y=f[y][i]; return f[x][0];} ËøôÈáåÂÜôÁöÑÊúâÁÇπÁÉÇ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶Áîª‰∏™Âõæ‰ºöÂæàÂ•ΩÁêÜËß£ ÂÖ®‰ª£Á†Å 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081#include<iostream>#include<cstdio>#include<cstring>#include<cmath>#include<algorithm>#define MAXN 500005#define MAXM 1000005using namespace std;int n,m,s,a,b;int cnt=0,head[MAXN],endd[MAXM],nxt[MAXM];int depth[MAXN],f[MAXN][20];int Log[MAXN];inline void getnum(int &num){ num=0; char c=getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c=getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) { num=(num<<3)+(num<<1)+(c&15); c=getchar(); } return;}inline void add_edge(int x,int y){ ++cnt; endd[cnt]=y,nxt[cnt]=head[x]; head[x]=cnt; return;}inline void dfs(int u,int fa){ depth[u]=depth[fa]+1; f[u][0]=fa; for (register int i=1;(1<<i)<=depth[u];++i) f[u][i]=f[f[u][i-1]][i-1]; for (register int i=head[u];i;i=nxt[i]) if (endd[i]!=fa) dfs(endd[i],u); return;}inline int lca(int x,int y){ if (depth[x]<depth[y]) swap(x,y); while (depth[x]>depth[y]) x=f[x][Log[depth[x]-depth[y]]]; if (x==y) return x; for (register int i=Log[depth[x]];~i;--i) if (f[x][i]!=f[y][i]) x=f[x][i],y=f[y][i]; return f[x][0];}int main(){ getnum(n),getnum(m),getnum(s); for (register int i=1;i<n;++i) { getnum(a),getnum(b); add_edge(a,b); add_edge(b,a); } dfs(s,0); Log[1]=0; for (register int i=2;i<=n;++i) Log[i]=Log[i/2]+1; while (m--) { getnum(a),getnum(b); printf("%d\n",lca(a,b)); } return 0;}

entry.title: „ÄêÊ®°Êùø„ÄëÂÖãÈ≤ÅÊñØÂç°Â∞î
entry.content:
Ë¥™ÂøÉ Áî®ÊúÄÁõ¥Êé•ÁöÑÊÉ≥Ê≥ïÂÅö„ÄÇÊääËæπÊåâÁÖßËæπÊùÉ‰ªéÂ∞èÂà∞Â§ßÊéíÂ∫èÔºå‰æùÊ¨°ÂèñÊØè‰∏ÄÊù°ËæπÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúËøôÊù°Ëæπ‰∏§‰∏™Á´ØÁÇπÂ∑≤ÁªèËÅîÈÄö‰∫ÜÔºåÈÇ£‰πàÂ∞±ÁªßÁª≠ÂæÄÂêéÔºåÂê¶ÂàôÊääËøôÊù°ËæπÂä†ËøõÂõæ‰∏≠ÔºàÊúÄÂºÄÂßãÊâÄÊúâËæπÈÉΩ‰∏çÂèñÔºåÂõæ‰∏∫ÁÇπÈõÜÁä∂ÊÄÅÔºâ„ÄÇ Ëá≥‰∫éÂÆûÁé∞ÊñπÊ≥ïÔºå‰ΩøÁî®Âπ∂Êü•ÈõÜ„ÄÇÂºÄÂßãÁöÑÁÇπÈõÜÁä∂ÊÄÅÂç≥Âπ∂Êü•ÈõÜÂàùÂßãÁä∂ÊÄÅÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÂä†ËæπÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÂ∞±Êää‰∏§‰∏™ÈõÜÂêàÂêàÂπ∂ÔºåÊü•ËØ¢‰∏§‰∏™ÁÇπÊòØÂê¶ËøûÈÄö‰ΩøÁî®Âπ∂Êü•ÈõÜÊü•ËØ¢„ÄÇ ËøòÊúâÂà§Êñ≠ÂõæÊòØÂê¶ËøûÈÄöÁöÑÂäûÊ≥ï„ÄÇÊòæÁÑ∂‰∏Ä‰∏™$n$‰∏™ÁÇπÁöÑÂõæÁöÑÊúÄÂ∞èÁîüÊàêÊ†ëÊúâ$n-1$Êù°ËæπÔºåÂõ†Ê≠§Êàë‰ª¨‰ΩøÁî®$cnt$ËÆ∞ÂΩïÂä†ËøõÂéªÁöÑËæπÊï∞ÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúË∑ëÂÆåÊâÄÊúâËæπ$cnt 
e n-1$ÈÇ£‰πàÂõæ‰∏çËÅîÈÄö ‰∏ä‰ª£Á†Å 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374757677787980818283#include<iostream>#include<cstdio>#include<cstring>#include<cmath>#include<algorithm>#define MAXM 200005#define MAXN 5005using namespace std;int n,m,f[MAXN];int cnt=0,ans=0;struct Edge{ int x,y,v;}e[MAXM];inline void getnum(int &num){ num=0; char c=getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c=getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) { num=(num<<3)+(num<<1)+(c&15); c=getchar(); } return;}inline bool cmp(Edge e1,Edge e2){ return e1.v<e2.v;}inline int find(int x){ if (f[x]==x) return x; f[x]=find(f[x]); return f[x];}inline void combine(int x,int y){ register int fx=find(x),fy=find(y); if (fx!=fy) f[fx]=fy; return;}inline bool query(int x,int y){ register int fx=find(x),fy=find(y); return fx==fy;}int main(){ getnum(n),getnum(m); for (register int i=1;i<=n;++i) f[i]=i; for (register int i=1;i<=m;++i) getnum(e[i].x),getnum(e[i].y),getnum(e[i].v); sort(e+1,e+1+m,cmp); for (register int i=1;i<=m;++i) { int x=e[i].x,y=e[i].y; if (!query(x,y)) { combine(x,y); ++cnt; ans+=e[i].v; } if (cnt==n-1) break; } if (cnt==n-1) printf("%d
",ans); else printf("orz
"); return 0;}

entry.title: „ÄêÊ®°Êùø„ÄëÁ∫øÊÄßÁ≠õÁ¥†Êï∞
entry.content: Á∫øÊÄßÁöÑÁ¥†Êï∞Á≠õ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ ËØÅÊòéËøáÁ®ãËßÅËøôÁØáÊñáÁ´† ‰∏ä‰ª£Á†Å 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455#include<iostream>#include<cstdio>#include<cstring>#include<cmath>#include<algorithm>#define MAXN 10000005using namespace std;int n,m,primenum,asknum;int primelist[MAXN],isnotprime[MAXN];inline void getnum(int &num){ num=0; char c=getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c=getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) { num=(num<<3)+(num<<1)+(c&15); c=getchar(); } return;}inline void getprime(int x){ memset(primelist,0,sizeof(primelist)); memset(isnotprime,0,sizeof(isnotprime)); primenum=0; isnotprime[0]=1,isnotprime[1]=1; for (register int i=2;i<=x;++i) { if (!isnotprime[i]) primelist[++primenum]=i; for (register int j=1;j<=primenum&&i*primelist[j]<=x;++j) { isnotprime[i*primelist[j]]=1; if (!(i%primelist[j])) break; } } return;}int main(){ getnum(n),getnum(m); getprime(n); while (m--) { getnum(asknum); printf("%s\n",isnotprime[asknum]?"No":"Yes"); } return 0;}

entry.title: „ÄêÊ®°Êùø„ÄëÂø´ÈÄüÂπÇ
entry.content: ÂæàÁÆÄÂçï ‰∏æ‰∏™‰æãÂ≠êÔºåÁÆó$base^{11}$ $11$ËΩ¨Âåñ‰∏∫$2$ËøõÂà∂ÊòØ$1011$ÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Êàë‰ª¨ÂèØ‰ª•Êää$base^{11}$ËΩ¨Âåñ‰∏∫$base^{2^0+2^1+2^3}$ÔºåÂç≥$base^{2^0} \times base^{2^1} \times base^{2^3}$ ‰∫éÊòØ‰ªéÂè≥ÂæÄÂ∑¶Â§ÑÁêÜ$1011‚Äã$ÁöÑÊØè‰∏Ä‰ΩçÔºàËÆæËøôÊòØÁ¨¨$i‚Äã$‰ΩçÔºâÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÊòØ$1‚Äã$Â∞±ÁªôÁªìÊûú‰πò‰∏ä$base^{2^{i-1}}‚Äã$ ÈÇ£‰πàËøô‰∏™$base‚Äã$ÁöÑ‰∫åÁöÑÊ¨°ÂπÇÊÄé‰πàÂ§ÑÁêÜÔºü Êàë‰ª¨Áî®‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂæàÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑÂäûÊ≥ï„ÄÇÂÅö$1011‚Äã$ÁöÑÊØè‰∏Ä‰ΩçÊó∂ÈÉΩËÆ©ÂΩìÂâçÁöÑ$baseËá™‚Äã$‰πòÔºåÁÑ∂Âêé‰Ω†‰ºöÂèëÁé∞Âú®Á¨¨$i‚Äã$‰ΩçÊó∂$base‚Äã$ÂèòÊàê‰∫Ü$base^{2^{i-1}}‚Äã$ÔºåÂ∞±ÂæàÂ•Ω ‰∏ä‰ª£Á†Å 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627#include<iostream>#include<cstdio>#include<cstring>#include<cmath>typedef long long LL;using namespace std;LL b,p,k;inline LL ksm(LL base,LL po,LL modnum){ register LL res=1; while (po) { if (po&1) res=res*base%modnum; base=base*base%modnum; po>>=1; } return res%modnum;}int main(){ scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&b,&p,&k); printf("%lld^%lld mod %lld=%lld\n",b,p,k,ksm(b,p,k)); return 0;}

entry.title: „ÄêÊ®°Êùø„ÄëÂπ∂Êü•ÈõÜ
entry.content: ÊâìÂºÄLuoguÊêúÁ¥¢Ê®°ÊùøÊéíÂ∫è‚Ä¶‚Ä¶Èô§‰∫ÜÂø´ÊéíÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊòØÂπ∂Êü•ÈõÜ ‰∫éÊòØÊàë‰ª¨Â∞±ÊÑâÂø´ÁöÑÂ§ç‰π†Âπ∂Êü•ÈõÜ‰∫Ü ËøòÊòØÊå∫ÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑÂòõ È¶ñÂÖàÊØè‰∏™Êï∞‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈõÜÂêàÔºåËøô‰∏™ÈõÜÂêàÁöÑÁà∏Áà∏ÊòØ‰ªñËá™Â∑± ÂÆö‰πâ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈÄíÂΩíÊâæÁ•ñÂÆóÁöÑÂáΩÊï∞„ÄÇËøôÈáåÂ∞±ÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™Ë∑ØÂæÑÂéãÁº©ÁöÑÊìç‰ΩúÔºåÊâæÂà∞Á•ñÂÆó‰ª•ÂêéÁõ¥Êé•ÊääËá™Â∑±ÊåÇÂà∞Á•ñÂÆó‰∏ãÈù¢ÔºåÊääÁ•ñÂÆóÂΩìÊàêÁà∏Áà∏ÔºàÁ•ñÂÆóÊàê‰∫ÜÊâÄÊúâ‰∫∫ÁöÑÁà∏Áà∏Ôºâ ÂêàÂπ∂‰∏§‰∏™ÈõÜÂêàA„ÄÅBÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÔºåÊâæÂá∫AÂíåBÈõÜÂêàÁöÑÁà∏Áà∏ÔºåÊääÂÖ∂‰∏≠‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁöÑÁà∏Áà∏ÊåÇÂà∞Âè¶‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁöÑÁà∏Áà∏‰∏ãÈù¢Ôºå‰∏§‰∏™ÈõÜÂêàÂ∞±ÂêàÂπ∂ÂÆåÊàêÂï¶ Êü•ËØ¢a„ÄÅbÊòØÂê¶Âú®‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈõÜÂêàÔºåÂ∞±ÊâæÂá∫A„ÄÅBÈõÜÂêàÁöÑÁà∏Áà∏ÁúãÁúãÊòØ‰∏çÊòØÂêå‰∏Ä‰∏™ÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÊòØÂ∞±ÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈõÜÂêàÂÜÖÔºå‰∏çÁÑ∂Â∞±‰∏çÊòØ emmÔºåËøôÁØáÊñáÁ´†ÂæàËØ¶ÁªÜÔºåÂèØ‰ª•ÁúãÁúã ‰∏ä‰ª£Á†Å 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970#include<iostream>#include<cstdio>#include<cstring>#include<cmath>#include<algorithm>#define MAXN 10005using namespace std;int n,m,z,x,y;int f[MAXN];inline void getnum(int &num){ num=0; char c=getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c=getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) { num=(num<<3)+(num<<1)+(c&15); c=getchar(); } return;}inline int find(int a){ if (f[a]==a) return a; else { f[a]=find(f[a]); return f[a]; }}inline int query(int a,int b){ register int fa=find(a),fb=find(b); return fa==fb;}inline void combine(int a,int b){ register int fa=find(a),fb=find(b); if (fa!=fb) f[fa]=fb; return;}int main(){ getnum(n),getnum(m); for (register int i=1;i<=n;++i) f[i]=i; for (register int i=1;i<=m;++i) { getnum(z),getnum(x),getnum(y); if (z==1) { combine(x,y); continue; } else { printf("%s\n",query(x,y)?"Y":"N"); continue; } } return 0;}

entry.title: Ê†ëÈìæÂâñÂàÜËØ¶Ëß£
entry.content: Ê®°ÊùøÈ¢òÂú®Ê≠§ÁÇπÂáªÊ≠§Â§ÑÂâçÂæÄÊ¥õË∞∑Ê®°ÊùøÈ¢òÔºà„ÄêÊ®°Êùø„ÄëÊ†ëÈìæÂâñÂàÜÔºâ Â§ÑÁêÜÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò Â∞Ü‰∏ÄÊ£µÊ†ë‰ªé$x$ËäÇÁÇπÂà∞$y$ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÊúÄÁü≠Ë∑ØÂæÑ‰∏äÊØè‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÊùÉÂÄºÂ¢ûÂä†$v$ Ê±Ç‰∏ÄÊ£µÊ†ë‰ªé$x$ËäÇÁÇπÂà∞$y$ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÊúÄÁü≠Ë∑ØÂæÑ‰∏äÊØè‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÊùÉÂÄºÂíå Â∞Ü‰∏ÄÊ£µÊ†ë‰ª•$x$ËäÇÁÇπ‰∏∫Ê†πÁöÑÂ≠êÊ†ëÂÜÖÁöÑÊØè‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÊùÉÂÄºÂ¢ûÂä†$v$ Ê±Ç‰∏ÄÊ£µÊ†ë‰ª•$x$ËäÇÁÇπ‰∏∫Ê†πÁöÑÂ≠êÊ†ëÂÜÖÁöÑÊØè‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÊùÉÂÄºÂíå Áõ∏ÂÖ≥Ê¶ÇÂøµ ÈáçÂÑøÂ≠êÔºöÂØπ‰∫éÊØè‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈùûÂè∂Â≠êËäÇÁÇπÔºåÂÆÉÁöÑÂÑøÂ≠ê‰∏≠Ôºå‰ª•Êüê‰∏ÄËäÇÁÇπ‰∏∫Ê†πÁöÑÂ≠êÊ†ëÁöÑËäÇÁÇπÊï∞ÊúÄÂ§ßÁöÑÈÇ£‰∏™ÂÑøÂ≠êÔºåÂè´ÂÅöËØ•ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÈáçÂÑøÂ≠ê ËΩªÂÑøÂ≠êÔºöÂØπ‰∫éÊØè‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈùûÂè∂Â≠êËäÇÁÇπÔºåÂÆÉÁöÑÂÑøÂ≠ê‰∏≠ÔºåÈùûÈáçÂÑøÂ≠êÁöÑÂÖ∂‰ªñÂÑøÂ≠êÔºåÂè´ÂÅöËØ•ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑËΩªÂÑøÂ≠ê Âè∂Â≠êËäÇÁÇπÊ≤°ÊúâÈáçÂÑøÂ≠ê‰πüÊ≤°ÊúâËΩªÂÑøÂ≠ê„ÄêÂõ†‰∏∫‰ªñÊ≤°ÊúâÂÑøÂ≠ê(Àâ‚ñΩÀâÔºõ)‚Ä¶ ÈáçËæπÔºöÂØπ‰∫éÊØè‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈùûÂè∂Â≠êËäÇÁÇπÔºåËøûÊé•ÂÆÉÂíåÂÆÉÁöÑÈáçÂÑøÂ≠êÁöÑËæπÔºåÂè´ÂÅöÈáçËæπ ËΩªËæπÔºö‰∏ÄÊ£µÊ†ë‰∏≠ÔºåÈô§ÂéªÈáçËæπÔºåÂâ©‰∏ãÁöÑËæπÔºåÂè´ÂÅöËΩªËæπ ÈáçÈìæÔºöÁõ∏ÈÇªÁöÑÈáçËæπËøûÊé•Ëµ∑Êù•ÁöÑÔºåËøûÊé•‰∏Ä‰∏≤ÈáçÂÑøÂ≠êÁöÑÈìæÔºåÂè´ÂÅöÈáçÈìæ ÂØπ‰∫éÊØè‰∏Ä‰∏™Âè∂Â≠êËäÇÁÇπÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÂÆÉÊòØËΩªÂÑøÂ≠êÔºåÂàôÊúâ‰∏ÄÊù°‰ª•ÂÆÉ‰∏∫Ëµ∑ÁÇπÁöÑÈïøÂ∫¶‰∏∫1ÁöÑÈáçÈìæ ÊØè‰∏ÄÊù°ÈáçÈìæ‰ª•ËΩªÂÑøÂ≠ê‰∏∫Ëµ∑ÁÇπÔºàÊ†πËäÇÁÇπÂèØËßÜ‰∏∫ËΩªÂÑøÂ≠êÔºâ „Äê‰ª•‰∏äÈùûÂ∏∏ÊäΩË±°ÔºåÊé•‰∏ãÊù•ÁúãÂõæ„Äë ËøôÊ†∑Â•ΩÁêÜËß£Â§ö‰∫ÜÂêßÔºàÂçÅÂàÜÊãÖÂøßÂì™ÈáåÁîªÈîô‰∫ÜÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÊúâËØ∑ËØÑËÆ∫ÂëäËØâÊàëÔºâ ‰∏§‰∏™$dfs$ÊòØ‰∏§‰∏™dfs‚ÄãÔºå‰∏çÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™dfs Âí≥Âí≥‚Ä¶‚Ä¶Ëøô‰∏§‰∏™$dfs$Â§ßÊ¶ÇÊòØÊ†ëÂâñÁöÑÁ≤æÈ´ìÊâÄÂú®‰∫ÜÂêß„ÄÇ $dfs1()$Ëøô‰∏Ä‰∏™$dfs$Ë¶ÅÂ§ÑÁêÜ‰ª•‰∏ãÂá†‰ª∂‰∫ãÊÉÖÔºö ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏Ä‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÊ∑±Â∫¶$dep[x]$ ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏Ä‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÁà∂‰∫≤$f[x]$ ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈùûÂè∂Â≠êËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÂ≠êÊ†ëÂ§ßÂ∞è$size[x]$ ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈùûÂè∂Â≠êËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÈáçÂÑøÂ≠êÁºñÂè∑$son[x]$ 1234567891011121314151617181920inline void dfs1(int fa,int x,int depth){ dep[x]=depth;//ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏Ä‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÊ∑±Â∫¶dep[x] f[x]=fa;//ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏Ä‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÁà∂‰∫≤f[x] size[x]=1;//ÂàùÂßãÂåñÊØè‰∏Ä‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÂ≠êÊ†ëÂ§ßÂ∞èsize[x]ÔºåÂÖàÊääËá™Â∑±Âä†‰∏äÂéª int maxs=-1;//maxsËÆ∞ÂΩï‰ª•ÈáçÂÑøÂ≠ê‰∏∫Ê†πÁöÑÂ≠êÊ†ëÂ§ßÂ∞èÔºåÊ≠§Â§ÑÂàùÂßãÂåñ‰æø‰∫éÊØîËæÉÊõ¥Êñ∞ for (register int i=head[x];i;i=nxt[i]) { if (endd[i]==fa) continue;//Â¶ÇÊûúÊòØÁà∂‰∫≤Â∞±continue dfs1(x,endd[i],depth+1);//ÈÄíÂΩídfsÂÖ∂ÂÑøÂ≠ê size[x]+=size[endd[i]];//Êää‰ª•Ëøô‰∏™ÂÑøÂ≠ê‰∏∫Ê†πÁöÑÂ≠êÊ†ëÂ§ßÂ∞èÂä†‰∏ä if (size[endd[i]]>maxs)//ÊØîËæÉÊ≠§ÂÑøÂ≠ê‰∏∫Ê†πÁöÑÂ≠êÊ†ëÂ§ßÂ∞è‰∏émaxsÂπ∂Êõ¥Êñ∞ { son[x]=endd[i]; maxs=size[endd[i]]; } } return;} $dfs2()$Ëøô‰∏™$dfs$Ë¶ÅÂ§ÑÁêÜ‰ª•‰∏ãÂá†‰ª∂‰∫ãÊÉÖÔºö Ëµã‰∫àÊØè‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÊñ∞ÁºñÂè∑$id[x]$ ÊääÊØè‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÁÇπÊùÉËµãÂÄºÂà∞Êñ∞ÁºñÂè∑‰∏ä$nw[x]$ ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÊâÄÂú®ÁöÑÈáçÈìæÁöÑÈ°∂Á´Ø$top[x]$ 12345678910111213141516inline void dfs2(int x,int topf)//topfÊòØÂΩìÂâçËøôÊù°ÈáçÈìæÁöÑÈ°∂Á´Ø{ id[x]=++num;//Ëµã‰∫àÊØè‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÊñ∞ÁºñÂè∑id[x] nw[num]=w[x];//ÊääÊØè‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÁÇπÊùÉËµãÂÄºÂà∞Êñ∞ÁºñÂè∑‰∏änw[x] top[x]=topf;//ËÆ∞ÂΩïÊØè‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÊâÄÂú®ÁöÑÈáçÈìæÁöÑÈ°∂Á´Øtop[x] if (!son[x])//Â¶ÇÊûúËøô‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÊ≤°ÊúâÂÑøÂ≠êÔºåÂàôËøîÂõû return; dfs2(son[x],topf);//ÂÖàÂ§ÑÁêÜÈáçÂÑøÂ≠êÔºåÊääËøô‰∏™ÂÑøÂ≠êÊé•Âà∞‰ª•topf‰∏∫ÂºÄÂ§¥ÁöÑÈáçÈìæ‰∏ä for (register int i=head[x];i;i=nxt[i])//ÈÅçÂéÜÊñ∞ÂÑøÂ≠êÂπ∂Â§ÑÁêÜ { if (endd[i]==f[x]||endd[i]==son[x]) continue;//Â¶ÇÊûúÊòØÁà∂ËäÇÁÇπÊàñÈáçÂÑøÂ≠êÂàôcontinue dfs2(endd[i],endd[i]);//ÊØè‰∏Ä‰∏™ËΩªÂÑøÂ≠êÈÉΩÊúâ‰∏ÄÊù°‰ª•ÂÆÉÂºÄÂ§¥ÁöÑÈáçÈìæ } return;} Âå∫Èó¥Â§ÑÁêÜÈ¢ÑÂ§ÑÁêÜÂÆå‰∫Ü‰ª•ÂêéÔºåÊàë‰ª¨Ë¶ÅÂπ≤Ê≠£‰∫ã‰∫Ü„ÄÇÈ¶ñÂÖàÊàë‰ª¨‰ºöÂèëÁé∞‰ª•‰∏ãÂá†ÁÇπÔºö $dfs2$‰∏≠Êàë‰ª¨ÊòØÂª∂‰∏ÄÊù°ÈáçÈìæÔºåÂÖàÂ§ÑÁêÜÈáçÂÑøÂ≠êÂÜçÂ§ÑÁêÜËΩªÂÑøÂ≠êÁöÑÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ÊØè‰∏ÄÊù°ÈáçÈìæ‰∏≠ÔºåËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÊñ∞ÁºñÂè∑ÊòØËøûÁª≠ÁöÑ Âõ†‰∏∫ÊòØ$dfs$Â§ÑÁêÜÁöÑÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ÔºåÊØè‰∏Ä‰∏™Â≠êÊ†ë‰∏≠ÁöÑÊñ∞ÁºñÂè∑‰πüÊòØËøûÁª≠ÁöÑ „ÄêÂÄüÂä©‰∏ãÈù¢ËøôÂº†Êñ∞ÁºñÂè∑ÂõæÊõ¥Â•ΩÁêÜËß£„Äë ÔºàÊàëÁúüÁöÑÊòØË¢´ÊàëËá™Â∑±ÁöÑÊâãÂÜôÊï∞Â≠óÁªô‰∏ëÂà∞‰∫Ü‚Ä¶‚Ä¶Ôºâ ËøôÊ†∑Êúâ‰ªÄ‰πàÁî®Âë¢Ôºü Êàë‰ª¨ËÄÉËôëÊàë‰ª¨Ë¶ÅÂ§ÑÁêÜÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢òÔºö Â§ÑÁêÜ‰ªªÊÑè‰∏§ËäÇÁÇπ‰πãÈó¥ÁöÑË∑ØÂæÑËÆæ‰∏§ËäÇÁÇπ‰πãÈó¥ÔºåÊâÄÂú®ÁöÑÈáçÈìæÁöÑÈ°∂Á´ØÊõ¥Ê∑±ÁöÑÁÇπ‰∏∫ËäÇÁÇπ$x$ÔºåÂ§ÑÁêÜËøáÁ®ãÂ¶Ç‰∏ã Â§ÑÁêÜ$x$ËäÇÁÇπÂà∞$x$ËäÇÁÇπÊâÄÂú®ÁöÑÈáçÈìæÁöÑÈ°∂Á´ØËøô‰∏ÄÊÆµÂå∫Èó¥ Êää$x$ËäÇÁÇπË∑≥Âà∞$x$ÊâÄÂú®ÁöÑÈáçÈìæÁöÑÈ°∂Á´ØËøô‰∏ÄËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÁà∂ËäÇÁÇπ ÈáçÂ§çÊâßË°åËøô‰∏ÄÊ≠•È™§ÔºåÁõ¥Âà∞$x$ËäÇÁÇπ‰∏é$y$ËäÇÁÇπÂú®Âêå‰∏ÄÊù°ÈáçÈìæ‰∏äÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÂä†‰∏äËøôÊÆµÂå∫Èó¥ÁöÑÁÇπÊùÉÂíåÂç≥ÂèØ„ÄÇ Âú®Â§ÑÁêÜËøô‰∏™ÈóÆÈ¢òÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÔºåÊàë‰ª¨‰ºöÂèëÁé∞ÔºåÂõ†‰∏∫Êàë‰ª¨ÂâçÈù¢Ê≥®ÊÑèÂà∞ÁöÑÁÇπÔºåÊØè‰∏ÄÊù°ÈáçÈìæ‰∏≠ÔºåËäÇÁÇπÁºñÂè∑ÊòØËøûÁª≠ÁöÑÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ÂèØ‰ª•ËÄÉËôë‰ΩøÁî®Á∫øÊÆµÊ†ëËøõË°åËøûÁª≠ÁºñÂè∑ËÆ°ÁÆóÂå∫Èó¥ÂíåÊàñÂ§ÑÁêÜÂå∫Èó¥Âä†ÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ Â∞Ü‰∏ÄÊ£µÊ†ë‰ªé$x$ËäÇÁÇπÂà∞$y$ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÊúÄÁü≠Ë∑ØÂæÑ‰∏äÊØè‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÊùÉÂÄºÂ¢ûÂä†$v$ÁöÑ‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö 123456789101112131415inline void updrange(int x,int y,int v){ v%=p; while (top[x]!=top[y])//ÂΩìxËäÇÁÇπÂíåyËäÇÁÇπ‰∏çÂú®Âêå‰∏ÄÊù°ÈáçÈìæÊó∂ÔºåÈáçÂ§çË∑≥Ë∑ÉxÁÇπ { if (dep[top[x]]<dep[top[y]])//‚Äú‰∏çÂ¶®ËÆæxÁÇπ‰∏∫‰∏§ÁÇπ‰∏≠ÊâÄÂú®ÈáçÈìæÈ°∂Á´ØÊ∑±Â∫¶Ê∑±ÁöÑÈÇ£‰∏Ä‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπ‚Äù swap(x,y); Add(1,1,n,id[top[x]],id[x],v);//Á∫øÊÆµÊ†ëÁöÑÂå∫Èó¥Âä†Êìç‰ΩúÔºåÊääxÁÇπÂà∞xÁÇπÊâÄÂú®ÈáçÈìæÈ°∂Á´ØËøô‰∏ÄÂå∫Èó¥ËøõË°åÂå∫Èó¥Âä† x=f[top[x]];//xË∑≥Âà∞xÊâÄÂú®ÈáçÈìæÈ°∂Á´ØËøô‰∏ÄËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÁà∂ËäÇÁÇπ } if (dep[x]>dep[y])//‚Äú‰∏çÂ¶®ËÆæxÁÇπ‰∏∫Ê∑±Â∫¶ËæÉÊµÖÁöÑÈÇ£‰∏ÄÁÇπ‚Äù swap(x,y); Add(1,1,n,id[x],id[y],v);//Ê≠§Êó∂xÁÇπÂíåyÁÇπÂú®Âêå‰∏ÄÈáçÈìæ‰∏äÔºå‰ΩøÁî®Á∫øÊÆµÊ†ëËøõË°åÂå∫Èó¥Âä† return;} Ê±Ç‰∏ÄÊ£µÊ†ë‰ªé$x$ËäÇÁÇπÂà∞$y$ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÊúÄÁü≠Ë∑ØÂæÑ‰∏äÊØè‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÊùÉÂÄºÂíåÁöÑ‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºåÂü∫Êú¨ÂêåÁêÜÔºö 123456789101112131415inline int qrange(int x,int y){ int ans=0; while (top[x]!=top[y]) { if (dep[top[x]]<dep[top[y]]) swap(x,y); ans=(ans+query(1,1,n,id[top[x]],id[x]))%p; x=f[top[x]]; } if (dep[x]>dep[y]) swap(x,y); ans=(ans+query(1,1,n,id[x],id[y]))%p; return ans;} ÊØèÊ¨°ÁöÑÂ§çÊùÇÂ∫¶‰∏∫$O(log^2n)$ Â§ÑÁêÜ‰ª•‰ªªÊÑèËäÇÁÇπ‰∏∫Ê†πÁöÑÂ≠êÊ†ëËÆæÊ≠§ËäÇÁÇπ‰∏∫$x$ÁÇπ„ÄÇËÅîÊÉ≥ÂâçÈù¢ÂèëÁé∞ÁöÑÔºå‰∏ÄÊ£µÂ≠êÊ†ë‰∏≠ËäÇÁÇπÁºñÂè∑ËøûÁª≠ÔºåËøòÊòØÂèØ‰ª•‰ΩøÁî®Á∫øÊÆµÊ†ëËøõË°åÂå∫Èó¥Â§ÑÁêÜ Â∞Ü‰∏ÄÊ£µÊ†ë‰ª•$x$ËäÇÁÇπ‰∏∫Ê†πÁöÑÂ≠êÊ†ëÂÜÖÁöÑÊØè‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÊùÉÂÄºÂ¢ûÂä†$v$ÁöÑ‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö 12345inline void updson(int x,int v){ Add(1,1,n,id[x],id[x]+size[x]-1,v%p);//‰ª•ËäÇÁÇπx‰∏∫Ê†πÁöÑÂ≠êÊ†ëÁºñÂè∑Âå∫Èó¥‰∏∫[id[x],id[x]+size[x]-1] return;} Ê±Ç‰∏ÄÊ£µÊ†ë‰ª•$x$ËäÇÁÇπ‰∏∫Ê†πÁöÑÂ≠êÊ†ëÂÜÖÁöÑÊØè‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑÊùÉÂÄºÂíåÁöÑ‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºåÂêåÁêÜÔºö 1234inline int qson(int x){ return query(1,1,n,id[x],id[x]+size[x]-1);} ‰ª£Á†Å#include<iostream>#include<cstdio>#include<cstring>#include<cmath>#include<algorithm>#define MAXN 100005#define MAXM 200005#define MAXT 4*MAXNtypedef long long LL;using namespace std;//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------int n,m,r,p;int w[MAXN],nw[MAXN],cnt=0,endd[MAXM],nxt[MAXM],head[MAXN];int dep[MAXN],f[MAXN],size[MAXN],son[MAXN],id[MAXN],num=0,top[MAXN];//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------inline void getnum(int &num){ num=0; char c=getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c=getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) { num=(num<<3)+(num<<1)+(c&15); c=getchar(); } return;}//---------------------------------------------------------------------------------struct SegTreeNode{ int val,add_tag;}segtree[MAXT];inline void build_seg(int root,int l,int r){ segtree[root].add_tag=0; if (l==r) segtree[root].val=nw[l]%p; else { int mid=(l+r)>>1; build_seg(root<<1,l,mid); build_seg(root<<1|1,mid+1,r); segtree[root].val=(segtree[root<<1].val%p+segtree[root<<1|1].val%p)%p; } return;}inline void segtree_add(int root,int l,int r,int v){ segtree[root].add_tag+=v; segtree[root].val+=(r-l+1)*v; segtree[root].val%=p; segtree[root].add_tag%=p; return;}inline void pushdown(int root,int l,int r){ int mid=(l+r)>>1; if (segtree[root].add_tag!=0) { segtree_add(root<<1,l,mid,segtree[root].add_tag); segtree_add(root<<1|1,mid+1,r,segtree[root].add_tag); segtree[root].add_tag=0; } return;}inline void Add(int root,int l,int r,int x,int y,int v){ if (l==x&&y==r) { segtree_add(root,l,r,v); return; } int mid=(l+r)>>1; pushdown(root,l,r); if (y<=mid) Add(root<<1,l,mid,x,y,v); else if (x>mid) Add(root<<1|1,mid+1,r,x,y,v); else { Add(root<<1,l,mid,x,mid,v); Add(root<<1|1,mid+1,r,mid+1,y,v); } segtree[root].val=(segtree[root<<1].val+segtree[root<<1|1].val)%p; return;}inline LL query(int root,int l,int r,int ql,int qr){ if(l==ql&&r==qr) return segtree[root].val%p; pushdown(root,l,r); int mid=(l+r)>>1; if (qr<=mid) return query(root<<1,l,mid,ql,qr)%p; if (ql>mid) return query(root<<1|1,mid+1,r,ql,qr)%p; return (query(root<<1,l,mid,ql,mid)%p+query(root<<1|1,mid+1,r,mid+1,qr)%p)%p;}//---------------------------------------------------------------------------------inline void add_edge(int u,int v){ ++cnt; endd[cnt]=v,nxt[cnt]=head[u]; head[u]=cnt;}//---------------------------------------------------------------------------------inline void dfs1(int fa,int x,int depth){ dep[x]=depth; f[x]=fa; size[x]=1; int maxs=-1; for (register int i=head[x];i;i=nxt[i]) { if (endd[i]==fa) continue; dfs1(x,endd[i],depth+1); size[x]+=size[endd[i]]; if (size[endd[i]]>maxs) { son[x]=endd[i]; maxs=size[endd[i]]; } } return;}inline void dfs2(int x,int topf){ id[x]=++num; nw[num]=w[x]; top[x]=topf; if (!son[x]) return; dfs2(son[x],topf); for (register int i=head[x];i;i=nxt[i]) { if (endd[i]==f[x]||endd[i]==son[x]) continue; dfs2(endd[i],endd[i]); } return;}//---------------------------------------------------------------------------------inline int qrange(int x,int y){ int ans=0; while (top[x]!=top[y]) { if (dep[top[x]]<dep[top[y]]) swap(x,y); ans=(ans+query(1,1,n,id[top[x]],id[x]))%p; x=f[top[x]]; } if (dep[x]>dep[y]) swap(x,y); ans=(ans+query(1,1,n,id[x],id[y]))%p; return ans;}inline void updrange(int x,int y,int v){ v%=p; while (top[x]!=top[y]) { if (dep[top[x]]<dep[top[y]]) swap(x,y); Add(1,1,n,id[top[x]],id[x],v); x=f[top[x]]; } if (dep[x]>dep[y]) swap(x,y); Add(1,1,n,id[x],id[y],v); return;}inline int qson(int x){ return query(1,1,n,id[x],id[x]+size[x]-1);}inline void updson(int x,int v){ Add(1,1,n,id[x],id[x]+size[x]-1,v%p); return;}//---------------------------------------------------------------------------------int main(){ getnum(n),getnum(m),getnum(r),getnum(p); for (register int i=1;i<=n;++i) getnum(w[i]); for (register int i=1;i<n;++i) { int a,b; getnum(a),getnum(b); add_edge(a,b); add_edge(b,a); } dfs1(0,r,1); dfs2(r,r); build_seg(1,1,n); while (m--) { int ord,x,y,z; getnum(ord); if (ord==1) { getnum(x),getnum(y),getnum(z); updrange(x,y,z); } else if (ord==2) { getnum(x),getnum(y); printf("%d\n",qrange(x,y)); } else if (ord==3) { getnum(x),getnum(z); updson(x,z); } else if (ord==4) { getnum(x); printf("%d\n",qson(x)); } } return 0;}

entry.title: „ÄêÊ®°Êùø„ÄëÈ´òÁ≤æÂ∫¶
entry.content: ÂøÉË°ÄÊù•ÊΩÆÊÉ≥Êñ∞ÂºÄ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊùøÂ≠êÊ†áÁ≠æÔºåÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊÉ≥Âà∞ÁöÑÁ´üÁÑ∂ÊòØÈ´òÁ≤æÂ∫¶ÔºüÔºüÔºü Êó¢ÁÑ∂Â¶ÇÊ≠§ÔºåÊàë‰ª¨Â∞±Á¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊîæÈ´òÁ≤æÂ∫¶Âëó‚ïÆ(‚ïØ‚ñΩ‚ï∞)‚ï≠  BigInteger{ int d[10005]; int len; inline void clean(){while (!d[len-1]&&len>1) len--;return;} BigInteger() {memset(d,0,sizeof(d));len=1;return;} BigInteger(int num) {*this=num;return;} BigInteger(char* num) {*this=num;return;} BigInteger operator =(char* str) { memset(d,0,sizeof(d)); int l=strlen(str); len=min(700,l); for (register int i=0;i<len;i++) { if (isdigit(str[len-i-1])) d[i]=str[len-i-1]-'0'; else d[i]=str[len-i-1]-'A'; } clean(); return *this; } BigInteger operator =(string str) { memset(d,0,sizeof(d)); int l=str.length(); len=min(700,l); for (register int i=0;i<len;i++) { if (isdigit(str[len-i-1])) d[i]=str[len-i-1]-'0'; else d[i]=str[len-i-1]-'A'+10; } clean(); return *this; } BigInteger operator =(int num) { char c[10005]; sprintf(c,"%d",num); *this=c; return *this; } BigInteger operator +(const BigInteger& b) { register int i; BigInteger c=*this; for (i=0;i<b.len;i++) { c.d[i]+=b.d[i]; if (c.d[i]>10-1) { c.d[i]%=10; c.d[i+1]++; } } while (c.d[i]>10-1) { c.d[i++]%=10; c.d[i]++; } c.len=max(len,b.len); if (c.d[i]&&c.len<= i) c.len++; return c; } BigInteger operator -(const BigInteger& b) { register int i; BigInteger c=*this; for (i=0;i<b.len;i++) { c.d[i]-=b.d[i]; if (c.d[i]<0) { c.d[i]+=10; c.d[i+1]--; } } while (c.d[i]<0) { c.d[i++]+=10; c.d[i]--; } c.clean(); return c; } BigInteger operator *(const BigInteger& b)const { BigInteger c; c.len=min(1010,len+b.len); for (register int i=0;i<b.len;i++) for (register int j=0;j<len;j++) c.d[i+j]+=d[j]*b.d[i]; for (register int i=0;i<c.len-1;i++) { c.d[i+1]+=c.d[i]/10; c.d[i]%=10; } c.clean(); return c; } BigInteger operator /(const BigInteger& b) { BigInteger c=*this,a=0; register int j; for (register int i=len-1;i>=0;i--) { a=a*10+d[i]; for (j=0;j<10;j++) if (a<b*(j+1)) break; c.d[i]=j; a=a-b*j; } c.clean(); return c; } BigInteger operator %(const BigInteger& b) { BigInteger a=0; register int j; for (register int i=len-1;i>=0;i--) { a=a*10+d[i]; for (j=0;j<10;j++) if (a<b*(j+1)) break; a=a-b*j; } return a; } BigInteger operator +=(const BigInteger &b) { *this=*this+b; return *this; } BigInteger operator -=(const BigInteger &b) { *this=*this-b; return *this; } BigInteger operator *=(const BigInteger &b) { *this=*this*b; return *this; } BigInteger operator /=(const BigInteger &b) { *this=*this/b; return *this; } BigInteger operator %=(const BigInteger &b) { *this=*this%b; return *this; } inline bool operator <(const BigInteger& b) const { if(len!=b.len) return len<b.len; for(register int i=len-1;i>=0;i--) if(d[i]!=b.d[i]) return d[i]<b.d[i]; return 0; } inline bool operator >(const BigInteger& b) const{return b<*this;} inline bool operator<=(const BigInteger& b) const{return !(b<*this);} inline bool operator>=(const BigInteger& b) const{return !(*this<b);} inline bool operator!=(const BigInteger& b) const{return b<*this||*this<b;} inline bool operator==(const BigInteger& b) const{return !(b<*this)&&!(b>*this);} inline string str() const { char s[10005]={}; for (register int i=0;i<len;i++) s[len-i-1]=d[i]+'0'; return s; }};

ÂÆåÁªìÔºÅÊííËä±ÔºÅ‚òÖ,¬∞:.‚òÜ(Ôø£‚ñΩÔø£)/$:.¬∞‚òÖ „ÄÇ ÁÆóÊ≥ïÊääÊâÄÊúâÁöÑ$A$ÊâîËøõ‰∏Ä‰∏™Â§ßÊ†πÂ†ÜÔºàÊâî‰∏Ä‰∏™ ($A_i$,$i$) ÁöÑpairÔºâÔºåÂêåÊó∂Áî®ÂèåÂêëÈìæË°®ËøûÊé•ÊØè‰∏™$A_i$„ÄÇÊØèÊ¨°ÂèñÂá∫Â†ÜÈ°∂ÂÖÉÁ¥†ÔºåËÆæÂ†ÜÈ°∂ÂÖÉÁ¥†‰∏∫($A_k$,$k$)ÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÊää$ans$Âä†‰∏ä$A_k$ÔºåÂú®ÂèåÂêëÈìæË°®‰∏≠Êää$A_k$ÁöÑÂâçÈ©±ÂíåÂêéÁªß È™üÊéâ Âà†ÊéâÔºåÊää$A_k$ÊîπÊàê$A_{k-1}+A_{k+1}-A_k$ÔºåÂÜçÊâîÂà∞Â†ÜÈáå„ÄÇÂ¶ÇÊ≠§ÂÅö$M$Ê¨°„ÄÇËæìÂá∫$ans$Âç≥ÂèØ„ÄÇ $Code$1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374757677#include<iostream>#include<cstdio>#include<cstring>#include<cmath>#include<algorithm>#include<queue>#define MAXN 200005using namespace std;int n,m,a[MAXN],ans=0;int pre[MAXN],nxt[MAXN],vis[MAXN];priority_queue< pair<int,int>,vector< pair<int,int> > >q;inline void getnum(int &num){ num=0; int f=1; register char c=getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) { if (c=='-') f=-1; c=getchar(); } while (isdigit(c)) { num=(num<<3)+(num<<1)+(c&15); c=getchar(); } num*=f; return;}inline void init(){ for (register int i=1;i<=n;++i) pre[i]=i-1,nxt[i]=i+1; pre[1]=n; nxt[n]=1; for (register int i=1;i<=n;++i) q.push(make_pair(a[i],i)); return;}inline void del(int x){ vis[x]=1; register int l=pre[x],r=nxt[x]; nxt[l]=r,pre[r]=l; return;}int main(){ getnum(n),getnum(m); if (m>(n>>1)) { printf("Error!\n"); return 0; } for (register int i=1;i<=n;++i) getnum(a[i]); init(); for (register int i=1;i<=m;++i) { while (vis[q.top().second]) q.pop(); register int tmp=q.top().second; q.pop(); ans+=a[tmp]; a[tmp]=a[pre[tmp]]+a[nxt[tmp]]-a[tmp]; del(pre[tmp]); del(nxt[tmp]); q.push(make_pair(a[tmp],tmp)); } printf("%d\n",ans); return 0;} Ê≥®ÊÑèÁÇπÂø´ËØªÊØèÊ¨°ÈÉΩÊâì‰∏äË¥üÊï∞Âêß‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‰∏ç‰ºöÊÖ¢Â§öÂ∞ëÁöÑ„ÄÇ‰∏çË¶ÅËÄÅÊòØÊÉ≥ÁùÄÊï∞ÊçÆËåÉÂõ¥ÔºåÊúâË¥üÊï∞ÂÜçÊâìÁ¨¶Âè∑„ÄÇÂá≠ÊàëËøôÊÑöË†¢ÁöÑÂ§ßËÑëËÇØÂÆöÊòØ‰ºöÂøòËÆ∞ÁöÑ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶

(.*)$", "working_dir": "${file_path}", "selector": "source.c, source.c++", "variants": [ { "name": "run", "shell_cmd": "g++ \"${file}\" -o \"/tmp/${file_base_name}\" -Wall && gnome-terminal -- bash -c
